snippet.title: PC Longplay [196] Putt-Putt Saves The Zoo
snippet.description:
http:www.longplays.org

Played By:- LegoKing831


Yes, if you are wondering, this is the third time I've done a video of this game. I'm new to longplays, so consider this my test run. 

Here is Putt-Putt Saves the Zoo, probably one of the most popular HE games out there. I made this one different from my other longplays in the fact that I made it very thorough by comparison. I talked to all of the baby animals and their parents, and even showed off some of the factual dialog for each animal.
 
I also took as many pictures as I possibly could, though I didn't get all of them (it's impossible anyway, because there's also seperate photos for when the animals are rescued, so you have to leave at least one photo out). 

Because I tried to make the longplay thorough, I took a very unusual route. I ended up screwing it up, as I forgot to get the rope before going to Jungle Land. I could have saved myself five minutes by getting the rope first, but it was too late by the time I had realized it. Ah well, I'm not perfect.
 
That's basically what I have to say. If you liked this longplay, you can always check out my channel if you wish; I've got a crapton more videos of these games, if you'd like to see them: http://www.youtube.com/user/legoking831 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
